MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Dundas Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.08pm. Our engineers have arrived in the Lothian street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.42pm on Sunday 18 October 2020.
